locations.name: hospital
locations.description: You are now in the hospital. Not wanting to risk yourself taking the lift in a hospital where the electricity supply seemed to be poor, you decided to go by staircase.

com.company.LevelNode@6ec8211c.text:
You decided to talk to her, and after a short conversation, you found out that she was a doctor.
You showed her the wounds you had on the way to hospital, asking if she could give you some kind of treatment.
Fortunately, she gladly helped me.

com.company.LevelNode@4fb64261.text:
He was holding a scapel you couldn't see from the distance.
He ran towards you so that you failed to escape and got a cut.

You realised that you are not able to run away, so decided to fight back.

com.company.LevelNode@7276c8cd.text:
You thanked her then explained that you were on the way to get a vaccine, and suggested her to accompany me.
She accepted without hesitation, and we went out of the hospital together.

com.company.LevelNode@7e0e6aa2.text:
While walking in the hallway, you found the first aid kit near the staircase.
Congratulations, you collected a first aid kit!

com.company.LevelNode@365185bd.text:
Not wanting to risk yourself taking the lift in a hospital where the electricity supply seemed to be poor, you decided to go by staircase.
At third floor, you found someone walking towards you.

He looks friendly with slightly chubby face, hooded chocolate-brown eyes, round nose and a big smile made by his heart-shaped lips.
He realised you coming towards him as well, and he seems to want a conversation with you.

com.company.LevelNode@544a2ea6.text: Feeling suspicious, you decided to pass by as if you had seen nothing.

com.company.LevelNode@1990a65e.text:
You walked further upstairs and while you walk around fifth floor, you found someone resting in the bed between the curtains in the hospital room.

The person is lying on the bed, but still awake.
You could see the long blonde sticking out, and she was tossing and turning under the duvet.

com.company.LevelNode@42607a4f.text: You thought that it is weird to have person in the middle of the hospital hallway, so you ignored him and went up the staircase quickly so he wouldn't follow you.

com.company.LevelNode@64485a47.text:
You walked further upstairs and while you walk around fifth floor, you found someone resting in the bed between the curtains in the hospital room.

The person is lying on the bed, but still awake.
You could see the long blonde sticking out, and she was tossing and turning under the duvet.

completionNodes.text:
You thanked her then explained that you were on the way to get a vaccine, and suggested her to accompany me.
She accepted without hesitation, and we went out of the hospital together.
Feeling suspicious, you decided to pass by as if you had seen nothing.

currentNode.text: You are now in the hospital.

locations.name: cottage
locations.description: You found a country-style cottage. Maybe you can steal some food? After all, you are very hungry and wanted to stock up more food and supplies.

com.company.LevelNode@c81cdd1.text:
You go into the storage room and find a muscular man in his mid 30's.
He doesn't seem to have noticed you yet.

com.company.LevelNode@543c6f6d.text: You manage to get out of the room and slam the door. You go to look around to see what else you can find in the cottage. You go into the toilet which is right next to the living room.

com.company.LevelNode@43738a82.text:
You go into the storage room and find a muscular man in his mid 30's.
He doesn't seem to have noticed you yet.

com.company.LevelNode@32eebfca.text: You approach the child, and take a closer look.

com.company.LevelNode@13eb8acf.text:
Win/Lose. If lose, deathexception. If win, go to next step. Here default win
Trying to find something useful, you open a drawer in a shelf to your right.

com.company.LevelNode@4e718207.text:
You gently shake the child to wake her up.
To your horror, she was actually pretending to be asleep and was hiding a kitchen knife in her hand behind her.
You don't want to hurt child, but at the same time, you don't want to die.

You don't want to wake her up since she seems to be comfortable lying there, you follow your initial plan and take a break for a while.
You creep towards toilet, go in, and carefully close the door.

com.company.LevelNode@51c8530f.text:
Congratulations, you found a hunting kit. Now, hunting kit has been added to your inventory!
You find a storage room

com.company.LevelNode@1fc2b765.text:
You tap him on the shoulder and ask what he is doing.
It turns out that he is a hunter, and had stopped by this cottage to search for useful tools and weapons.

He tells you that he found AR-15 style 12 gauge with muzzle flash and 2 mags with 10 round capacity in the room.
Thinking it will be great to accompany him, you suggest working together to find a vaccine.

Hunter joined your team.
Choose the next location to go.

You ignore the man and leave the cottage.
Choose the next location to go.

com.company.LevelNode@1d371b2d.text: You manage to get out of the room and slam the door. You go to look around to see what else you can find in the cottage. You go into the toilet which is right next to the living room.

com.company.LevelNode@7403c468.text:
Congratulations, you found a hunting kit. Now, hunting kit has been added to your inventory!
You find a storage room

completionNodes.text:
You tap him on the shoulder and ask what he is doing.
It turns out that he is a hunter, and had stopped by this cottage to search for useful tools and weapons.

He tells you that he found AR-15 style 12 gauge with muzzle flash and 2 mags with 10 round capacity in the room.
Thinking it will be great to accompany him, you suggest working together to find a vaccine.

Hunter joined your team.
Choose the next location to go.

You ignore the man and leave the cottage.
Choose the next location to go.

currentNode.text: You go inside the cottage and catch a glimpse of a child sitting on the cozy sofa in the small living room. She is dozing off, probably because it is warm inside.

locations.name: forest
locations.description: You notice that the more you walk, the more densely packed the trees stand. You are entering a forest.

com.company.LevelNode@22eeefeb.text: You quickly passed by, knowing that it is abnormal to have a person in the middle of this forest after zombie outbreak.

com.company.LevelNode@396e2f39.text: Having been hungry, you decided to hunt after confirming that you didn't have enough food.

com.company.LevelNode@12c8a2c0.text: You successfully hunt and get meat.

com.company.LevelNode@75881071.text:
Walking through the damp, dark road, you realised that there was the old man between the trees.
He hasn't seen your side yet.

com.company.LevelNode@a74868d.text: You decided to pass by as you were not confident enough to hunt it.

com.company.LevelNode@78ac1102.text:
When you heard the rustling sound between the trees, you were stiffened nervously, but soon realised it was an animal that was making the sound.
Going closer, you carefully looked through trees and soon noticed that the animal was a (deer).

com.company.LevelNode@289d1c02.text:
Wondering why he was in the middle of this forest, you approached him with curiosity and tried to talk to him.
You didn't know because he wasn't looking in your direction, but he had dead, lifeless looking eyes with stones in his hands.
Even before you realise, he looked back at you and started to throw stones towards you.

com.company.LevelNode@3891771e.text:
When you heard the rustling sound between the trees, you were stiffened nervously, but soon realised it was an animal that was making the sound.
Going closer, you carefully looked through trees and soon noticed that the animal was a (deer).

completionNodes.text:
Walking through the damp, dark road, you realised that there was the old man between the trees.
He hasn't seen your side yet.

currentNode.text: You are in a forest

locations.name: lab
locations.description: This journey just never seems to end. You miss the warm embrace of your family and the smell of home. This journey has been unforgiving to you mentally and physically. You get flashbacks of your loved ones who had died before you in your arms. You wonder, “maybe it’s time for me to go too…”. But then, as you walk over a hill, you slowly see a pristine white building over the horizon. It seems to be… it seems to be… Congratulations, you finally reached the laboratory! Thankfully, there are no zombies as there are many soldiers inside, so you are safe now. You walk into the laboratory, and there are researchers who are ready to provide you with vaccines.

completionNodes.text: Done.

currentNode.text: Done.

locations.name: road
locations.description: You continue on your journey to the laboratory, and you end up on a concrete road.

com.company.LevelNode@150c158.text: Thanks to her, you could go to the next destination safely and quickly.

com.company.LevelNode@2e3fc542.text: As you kept walking, you found a taxi that seemed to have person inside. You knocked on the door to have a conversation with middle-aged woman inside. She rolled down the taxi window and asked what you were doing on the road, not being in a safe place and you explained her your situation. She said she could drive you to the place where you had to go.

completionNodes.text: Thanks to her, you could go to the next destination safely and quickly.

currentNode.text:
You heard the crackling sound coming from chewing pieces of meat and bones. You are feeling short of breath and barely swallowing saliva.
Panic-stricken for a moment, you unconsciously dropped onto the floor and your palms touched the rough ground full of dust, but could not even realise it.
You saw the zombie attacking someone, so you stepped back into the bush falteringly.

completionNodes.text: Choose a place to go.

currentNode.text: Choose a place to go.

completionNodes.text: Choose a place to go.

currentNode.text: Choose a place to go.

You walked further upstairs and while you walk around fifth floor, you found someone resting in the bed between the curtains in the hospital room.

The person is lying on the bed, but still awake.
You could see the long blonde sticking out, and she was tossing and turning under the duvet.

completionNodes.text:
You thanked her then explained that you were on the way to get a vaccine, and suggested her to accompany me.
She accepted without hesitation, and we went out of the hospital together.
Feeling suspicious, you decided to pass by as if you had seen nothing.

currentNode.text: You are now in the hospital.

source.name: forest
source.description: You notice that the more you walk, the more densely packed the trees stand. You are entering a forest.

com.company.LevelNode@22eeefeb.text: You quickly passed by, knowing that it is abnormal to have a person in the middle of this forest after zombie outbreak.

com.company.LevelNode@396e2f39.text: Having been hungry, you decided to hunt after confirming that you didn't have enough food.

com.company.LevelNode@12c8a2c0.text: You successfully hunt and get meat.

com.company.LevelNode@75881071.text:
Walking through the damp, dark road, you realised that there was the old man between the trees.
He hasn't seen your side yet.

com.company.LevelNode@a74868d.text: You decided to pass by as you were not confident enough to hunt it.

com.company.LevelNode@78ac1102.text:
When you heard the rustling sound between the trees, you were stiffened nervously, but soon realised it was an animal that was making the sound.
Going closer, you carefully looked through trees and soon noticed that the animal was a (deer).

com.company.LevelNode@289d1c02.text:
Wondering why he was in the middle of this forest, you approached him with curiosity and tried to talk to him.
You didn't know because he wasn't looking in your direction, but he had dead, lifeless looking eyes with stones in his hands.
Even before you realise, he looked back at you and started to throw stones towards you.

com.company.LevelNode@3891771e.text:
When you heard the rustling sound between the trees, you were stiffened nervously, but soon realised it was an animal that was making the sound.
Going closer, you carefully looked through trees and soon noticed that the animal was a (deer).

completionNodes.text:
Walking through the damp, dark road, you realised that there was the old man between the trees.
He hasn't seen your side yet.

currentNode.text: You are in a forest

destination.name: road
destination.description: You continue on your journey to the laboratory, and you end up on a concrete road.

com.company.LevelNode@150c158.text: Thanks to her, you could go to the next destination safely and quickly.

com.company.LevelNode@2e3fc542.text: As you kept walking, you found a taxi that seemed to have person inside. You knocked on the door to have a conversation with middle-aged woman inside. She rolled down the taxi window and asked what you were doing on the road, not being in a safe place and you explained her your situation. She said she could drive you to the place where you had to go.

completionNodes.text: Thanks to her, you could go to the next destination safely and quickly.

currentNode.text:
You heard the crackling sound coming from chewing pieces of meat and bones. You are feeling short of breath and barely swallowing saliva.
Panic-stricken for a moment, you unconsciously dropped onto the floor and your palms touched the rough ground full of dust, but could not even realise it.
You saw the zombie attacking someone, so you stepped back into the bush falteringly.

source.name: hospital
source.description: You are now in the hospital. Not wanting to risk yourself taking the lift in a hospital where the electricity supply seemed to be poor, you decided to go by staircase.

com.company.LevelNode@6ec8211c.text:
You decided to talk to her, and after a short conversation, you found out that she was a doctor.
You showed her the wounds you had on the way to hospital, asking if she could give you some kind of treatment.
Fortunately, she gladly helped me.

com.company.LevelNode@4fb64261.text:
He was holding a scapel you couldn't see from the distance.
He ran towards you so that you failed to escape and got a cut.

You realised that you are not able to run away, so decided to fight back.

com.company.LevelNode@7276c8cd.text:
You thanked her then explained that you were on the way to get a vaccine, and suggested her to accompany me.
She accepted without hesitation, and we went out of the hospital together.

com.company.LevelNode@7e0e6aa2.text:
While walking in the hallway, you found the first aid kit near the staircase.
Congratulations, you collected a first aid kit!

com.company.LevelNode@365185bd.text:
Not wanting to risk yourself taking the lift in a hospital where the electricity supply seemed to be poor, you decided to go by staircase.
At third floor, you found someone walking towards you.

He looks friendly with slightly chubby face, hooded chocolate-brown eyes, round nose and a big smile made by his heart-shaped lips.
He realised you coming towards him as well, and he seems to want a conversation with you.

com.company.LevelNode@544a2ea6.text: Feeling suspicious, you decided to pass by as if you had seen nothing.

destination.name: lab
destination.description: This journey just never seems to end. You miss the warm embrace of your family and the smell of home. This journey has been unforgiving to you mentally and physically. You get flashbacks of your loved ones who had died before you in your arms. You wonder, “maybe it’s time for me to go too…”. But then, as you walk over a hill, you slowly see a pristine white building over the horizon. It seems to be… it seems to be… Congratulations, you finally reached the laboratory! Thankfully, there are no zombies as there are many soldiers inside, so you are safe now. You walk into the laboratory, and there are researchers who are ready to provide you with vaccines.

completionNodes.text: Done.

currentNode.text: Done.
